<h2>Changes</h2>
<p><a href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1728657/365079545-5d60f6c7-a166-4460-9c64-23fc64be7978.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..FKr4gKgIpmZosvap1EtkTIXL24iUZLPFyaFLnBTSDVI" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img alt="34" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1728657/365079545-5d60f6c7-a166-4460-9c64-23fc64be7978.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..FKr4gKgIpmZosvap1EtkTIXL24iUZLPFyaFLnBTSDVI" /></a></p>
<h3>ðŸš€ Features</h3>
<ul>
<li>A nifty processing toolbox has been added into QField, with countless algorithms available to edit features and geometries while in the field</li>
<li>Geofencing functionality has landed in QField, allowing users to use vector layers to define geofenced areas to warn users or restrict areas where digitizing can occur</li>
<li>Project variables are now shown and customizable within the variable editor</li>
<li>The ratio and resolution settings for photos captured by the QField camera</li>
<li>Date and positioning details can be imprinted onto photos captured by the QField camera</li>
</ul>
<h3>âœ¨ Improvements</h3>
<ul>
<li>A visual revamp of the variables panel provides more space for variable content and easier interaction</li>
<li>QFieldâ€™s growing documentation is now searchable directly within QField through the search bar, simply type ? followed by keyword(s)</li>
<li>Users can now flag folders as â€˜favoritesâ€™ when browsing local datasets and projects</li>
<li>The cloud projects list now comes with a nifty search bar</li>
<li>Significant improvements in attachment upload to the QFieldCloud servers (if this was a problem in the past, try again!)</li>
<li>Improvements to the QField camera geotagging functionality</li>
<li>On mobile devices, the home screen has a shutdown button to insure authentication details are cleared</li>
<li>Projects can now have a default active layer set for each map theme</li>
</ul>

<h3>ðŸªŸ Windows improvements</h3>
<ul>
<li>QField is now <a href="https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/xp99h3bcx4bw7f" rel="nofollow">installable via Microsoft Store</a></li>
</ul>
